LanguageData.DR_BasicWear.label: Basic Wear
LanguageData.DR_BasicWear.description: It's Basic wear of Dragonian. It is still unclear how they dress up and make it.
LanguageData.DR_BasicDress.label: basic dress
LanguageData.DR_BasicDress.description: Dress decorated with ribbon and flowers. Breasts are clearly exposed.
LanguageData.DR_GreekDress.label: dress A
LanguageData.DR_GreekDress.description: It's a dress tied with a string.
LanguageData.DR_GreekHanZo.label: dress B
LanguageData.DR_GreekHanZo.description: It is a dress worn over only one side.
LanguageData.DR_GreekPriest.label: dress C
LanguageData.DR_GreekPriest.description: It is a dress that is dressed back and forth.
LanguageData.DR_GreekSexyDress.label: dress D
LanguageData.DR_GreekString.label: dress E
LanguageData.DR_GreekString.description: It is dress fixed with strings.
LanguageData.DR_JapaneseDress.label: dress F
LanguageData.DR_JapaneseDress.description: The dress is surrounded by cloth.
LanguageData.DR_Onepiece.label: dress G
LanguageData.DR_EveningDress.label: dress H
LanguageData.DR_EveningDress.description: A cool Evening dress with a side opening.
LanguageData.DR_Hat.label: flower deco
LanguageData.DR_JapanHairAcc.label: Japanese style hair acc
LanguageData.DR_Necklace.label: necklace
LanguageData.DR_Necklace.description: It is a necklace with a bell.
LanguageData.DR_BellNecklace.label: necklace bell
LanguageData.DR_BellNecklace.description: It is a necklace with a bell.
LanguageData.DR_SunHat.label: sun Hat
LanguageData.DR_SunHat.description: It is a wide hat with a brim to cover the sun.
LanguageData.DR_FlowerRibon.label: flower ribon
LanguageData.DR_FlowerRibon.description: An ornament with ribbons and flowers.
LanguageData.DR_MaleDress.label: Basic Wear
LanguageData.DR_MaleDress.description: It's Basic wear of Dragonian. It is still unclear how they dress up and make it.
